import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" export default function Empinsert() { const [employee,setEmployee]=useState({ name:"", emp_id:"", department:"design", designation:"lead", project:"", type:"office", status:"temporary" }); const [fileimage,setFileimage]=useState(null); function updat(eve){ setEmployee({...employee,[eve.target.name]:eve.target.value}) } function fileupload(eve){ setFileimage(eve.target.files[0]) } const formdata=new FormData(); formdata.append("image",fileimage); formdata.append("name",employee.name); formdata.append("emp_id",employee.emp_id); form function inserting(eve){ eve.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:3006/emp/insert",employee) .then((res)=>{ if(res.data.success){ alert("inserted succesfully") } }) .catch((err)=>console.log(err)) } console.log(employee) return (
>back
